Landing.title: Make Your Own Music Flow
Landing.trendsExp: Explore the most popular music from around the world.
Landing.trendsExp1: By listening to a variety of music, you can discover the perfect music that suits your taste.
Landing.noteExp1: You can create a new Flow starting from the Note.
Landing.noteExp2: And you can add your own music sources to develop the original Note.
Landing.recordExp: A single Flow can contain multiple Records.
Landing.recordExp1: For example, you can add a guitar sound source and then add a drum sound source.
Landing.recordExp2: You can record messages whenever changes are made.
Landing.releaseExp: The completed Flow, built up from multiple Records, can be Released and publicly shared.
Landing.join: Thank you for listening. Now Join in!

Feed.feedExp: Follow your favorite artists on MUGIT and see every track they post right here.
